title: High Reliability Operations & Human Performance Essentials
description: A focused foundation course covering the essential principles of all six human performance competencies. Designed for operational teams who need practical skills quickly. Addresses the critical factors behind 80% of workplace incidents attributed to human error.
learningObjectives: Maintain situational awareness and recognize threats to awareness
Apply appropriate decision-making approaches under pressure
Coordinate effectively as a team member
Recognize human performance limitations and error prevention strategies

progression.next: Individual Tier 2 Masterclasses for advanced depth
